# The `LoopAnalysis` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Analysis pass that exposes the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a></code> for a function. <a href="#details">More...</a>
